summary: The diff demonstrates comprehensive implementation of all three requirements. Typography updates include Google Fonts imports (Dancing Script, Playfair Display, Great Vibes) with proper heading styles and utility classes. Color scheme changes show OKLCH format adoption throughout with blue primary colors, red destructive/accent colors, and white/light backgrounds for both light and dark modes. Component-level styling updates are evident across all specified pages with consistent application of new colors, gradients, borders, and calligraphic fonts.
